attack_dominance.name: Attack Dominance
attack_dominance.description: When gaining a level, a Quarryman might receive a *guaranteed bonus to their Attack stat* that is notably higher than other backgrounds, reflecting their raw, focused power.

leverage_weakness.name: Leverage Weakness
leverage_weakness.description: Description of how leveraging weakness works (e.g., bonus damage against certain enemy types, or an active skill to debuff an enemy).

effect.notes: Example: Deals 8 physical damage. (Conditional bonus can be added later)

shattering_blow.name: Shattering Blow
shattering_blow.description: A powerful attack that can break enemy defenses or deal significant damage.

effect.notes: Example: Deals 120% damage and reduces target's armor by 2 for 2 turns.

exploit_weakness.name: Exploit Weakness
exploit_weakness.description: Capitalizes on enemy vulnerabilities for increased effectiveness.

effect.notes: Example: Applies a condition granting +15% critical hit chance for the next attack/turn.

first_strike.name: First Strike
first_strike.description: Grants an advantage at the beginning of combat.

effect.notes: Example: Always acts first in combat if conditions met.

defensive_actions.name: Defensive Actions
defensive_actions.description: Improves survivability through enhanced defensive maneuvers.

mending_form.name: Mending Form
mending_form.description: Allows for slow recovery or improved healing.

effect.notes: Example: Applies a condition that regenerates 5 HP per turn for 3 turns.

stalwart_stance.name: Stalwart Stance
stalwart_stance.description: A defensive posture that greatly increases resilience at the cost of mobility or offense.

volitile_stat_gain.name: Volatile Stat Gain
volitile_stat_gain.description: Stat increases upon leveling are unpredictable, with one stat receiving a major boost and others minor ones.

effect.notes: This ability's effect is primarily handled in Entity.accounting(). This entry is for description and identification.

slip_the_weave.name: Slip the Weave
slip_the_weave.description: A momentary distortion of reality allowing for evasion or repositioning.

effect.notes: Example: Applies a condition granting +25% evasion for 1 turn.

void_glimpse.name: Void Glimpse
void_glimpse.description: Occasional insights into the unseen, potentially revealing secrets or weaknesses.
